docs.lead_paragraph: Whisking in egg and lemon just before serving enriches an already hearty dish.

headline.seo: Valencian Chickpea and Chard Soup — Recipes for Health

docs.snippet: Whisking in egg and lemon just before serving enriches an already hearty dish.

docs.lead_paragraph: BLOCH--Jacques, on September 20, 2011, at the age of 91. Proud husband, father and grandfather. Former POW (World War II, 106th Infantry Division, Battle of the Bulge, Stalag 11B), Director, Montefiore Medical Center Nutrition Department for 37 years, 15 year volunteer at the Bronx VA Medical Center. Survived by his wife of 62 years, Jean; his son, Norman, and his wife, Janice; his daughter, Elaine, and her husband, Steve; and his grandchildren, Rachel, Rebecca, Leah, Alyssa, Carly and Samuel. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the American Ex-Prisoners of War Association, National Headquarters, 3201 East Pioneer Parkway #
